title: National Assembly By-Election (Mwansabombwe Constituency No. 65 and Lukashya Constituency No. 98) (Election Date and Time Poll) Order, 2020
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 419
Gazette dated Friday, 21st August, 2020
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.71 OF2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (General) Regulations, 2016
The National Assembly By-Elections (Mwansabombwe
Constituency No. 65 and Lukashya Constituency No. 98)
(Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2020
WHEREASinpursuanceofArticle72(8)oftheConstitution,the Cap.1
Speaker of the National Assembly has informed the Electoral
Commission of Zambia of the vacancies in respect of
Mwansabombwe Constituency No. 65 by reason of death of
Honourable Rodgers Mwewa, Member of Parliament for
MwansabombweandLukashyaConstituencyNo.98byreasonof
deathofHonourableMwenyaMunkonge,MemberofParliament
forLukashyaConstituency,andthedeclarationbytheSpeakerof
the National Assembly of the vacancies in respect of
MwansabombweandLukashyaConstituencies.
NOWTHEREFORE,inexerciseof the powerscontainedinArticle
57(3) of the Constitution and Regulation 15(1) of the Electoral Cap.1
Process(General)Regulations,2016,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Assembly By- Title
Election (Mwansabombwe Constituency No. 65 and Lukashya
ConstituencyNo.98)(ElectionDateandTimePoll)Order,2020.
2. A Candidate for election as a Member of Parliament for Nomination
MwansabombweConstituencyNo.65andLukashyaConstituency forelection
No. 98 shall be lodged with the Returning Officer on Thursday,
27thAugust,2020,between0900hoursand1500hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 27th Campaign
August,2020at1500hoursandcloseat1800hoursonWednesday, period
9thSeptember,2020.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
420 StatutoryInstruments 21stAugust,2020
Electiondate 4. (1) ThepollsfortheelectionofaMemberofParliamentin
andtimeof the Constituencies referred to in paragraph 2 shall be taken on
poll
Thursday, 17th September, 2020 between 0600 hours and 1800
hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a Constituency if only one
candidateisvalidlynominated.
Made bythe Electoral Commissionof Zambia at Lusaka this
18thdayof August,2020.
JUSTICE E.E. CHULU,
Chairperson
E.J. SIKAZWE,
Member
A. D. SIMWINGA,
Member
LUSAKA
18thAugust,2020
[EC.101/5/2CONF.]
